Paragraph: The hole mobility ( μ ) was estimated in the saturated regime from the derivative plots of the square root of source - drain current ( I SD ) versus gate voltage ( V G ) through equation 2 where W is the channel width , L is the channel length , C i is the capacitance per unit area of the gate dielectric layer ( SiO 2 , 500 nm , C i = 7.5 nF / cm^2 ) , and V T is the threshold voltage.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

I apologize for the mistake in my previous response. Here are the valid entities that clearly refer to "Material name" in the given paragraph, presented as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| SiO2 |

The paragraph mentions SiO2 as the material used for the gate dielectric layer, and C i is defined as the capacitance per unit area of the gate dielectric layer. Therefore, C i is not a material name and should not be included in the list of material names.

Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The hole mobility ( μ ) was estimated in the saturated regime from the derivative plots of the square root of source - drain current ( I SD ) versus gate voltage ( V G ) through equation 2 where W is the channel width , L is the channel length , C i is the capacitance per unit area of the gate dielectric layer ( SiO 2 , 500 nm , C i = 7.5 nF / cm^2 ) , and V T is the threshold voltage.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value | Description |
| --- | --- |
| μ | Hole mobility |
| I SD | Square root of source-drain current |
| V G | Gate voltage |
| W | Channel width |
| L | Channel length |
| C i | Capacitance per unit area of gate dielectric layer (SiO2) |
| V T | Threshold voltage |

Note: The property values are presented in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value | Description |
| --- | --- |
| μ | Hole mobility |
| W | Channel width |
| L | Channel length |
| C i | Capacitance per unit area of gate dielectric layer (SiO2) |
| V T | Threshold voltage |

The following entities do not clearly refer to "Value of material property":

* "I SD" (square root of source-drain current) is a mathematical expression that involves a material property (current), but it is not a direct measure of a material property.
* "V G" (gate voltage) is a parameter that controls the behavior of a material (semiconductor), but it is not a direct measure of a material property.

Therefore, the valid entities that clearly refer to "Value of material property" are:

* μ (hole mobility)
* W (channel width)
* L (channel length)
* C i (capacitance per unit area of gate dielectric layer)
* V T (threshold voltage)
